1317300.name: Bad Meme Supporter Edition
1317300.description:
Support further development of Bad Meme! As a small token of thanks, you get: The level editor, an extra character, new achievements, and access to a suggestion box!

LEVEL EDITOR
  • Make new levels!
  • Modify current levels!
  • Note: There is no in-game way to share the maps, but you can send someone the \maps\ folders to share them.

NEW CHARACTER - MEATSPIN
  • Gain more points by spinning a lot!
  • How many times can you spin your meat?

NEW ACHIEVEMENTS
  • 7 new achievements for previous characters
  • 1 new achievement for the new character, Meatspin

SUGGESTION BOX
  • Get the developer's ear directly for ideas on what direction to take the game (no promises)!
